verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of the sons of Korah. Oh <S%H8628>clap<s%> your <S%H3709>hands<s%>, all ye <S%H5971>peoples<s%>; <S%H7321>Shout<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>triumph<s%>.
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> Most <S%H5945>High<s%> is <S%H3372>terrible<s%>; He is a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> over all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
He <S%H1696>subdueth<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> under <S%H5971>us<s%>, And nations under our <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
He <S%H977>chooseth<s%> our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for <S%H1347>us<s%>, The glory of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> whom he <S%H157>loved<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>
God <S%H430><s%> is gone <S%H5927>up<s%> with a <S%H8643>shout<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>.
Sing <S%H2167>praise<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%>, sing <S%H2167>praises<s%>: Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto our <S%H4428>King<s%>, sing <S%H2167>praises<s%>.
For <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: Sing ye <S%H2167>praises<s%> with <S%H7919>understanding<s%>.

The <S%H5081>princes<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are gathered <S%H622>together<s%> To be the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>: For the <S%H4043>shields<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> belong unto <S%H430>God<s%>; He is <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H5927>exalted<s%>.
